  • Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.utility used by edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol 
    Class and Description
    SigmaCommonInput
    Marker interface for common input of Sigma Protocols.
    SigmaProtocolMsg
    Every Sigma protocol prover/receiver needs to send messages during the protocol execution.
    SigmaProverInput
    Every Sigma protocol prover needs inputs during the protocol execution, but every concrete prover needs different inputs.
    SigmaSimulatorOutput
    Every sigma simulator outputs the result in the end of it's compute function, but each one can outputs different values.
